ygData.subject: Bye Bye Tinkering!!
ygData.msgSnippet: well the waterstone spell for magicians are in the game so now we all can kiss the tinkering skill goodbye! *kiss kiss* And they have still not removed the
ygData.messageBody:
well the waterstone spell for magicians are in the game so now we all can kiss the tinkering skill goodbye! *kiss kiss*
And they have still not removed the skill cap, if I would run my company as verant does i would be out of work in no time. but how many of us want to cancel our account to make a point and lose our hard earned items and levels ? not many i would think.

Iï¿½m werry sorry to see anather potential good game being nerfed to unplayble.



Askur of Veeshan
